meanings.sent1: The unutilized tools were gathering dust in the shed.
meanings.sent2: The unutilized resources could have been helpful in the project.
meanings.sent3: The unutilized picnic basket felt left out of the outdoor fun.
meanings.sent4: Her unutilized potential was like a hidden treasure waiting to be discovered.
meanings.sent5: The unutilized opportunities whispered promises of what could have been.

meanings.definition: Not put to use or employed
meanings.sent1: The unutilized space in the garage was perfect for storage.
meanings.sent2: The unutilized funds remained untouched in the bank account.
meanings.sent3: The unutilized vacation days begged to be taken for a relaxing break.
meanings.sent4: His unutilized skills were like a dormant volcano waiting to erupt.
meanings.sent5: The unutilized time slipped away unnoticed, never to return.
